action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Music
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Two years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Cooking
AVAILABILITY: As soon as possible

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: I would answer "yes" to the question if I asked the interviewer what area I studied, they would know the answer.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: I would answer "yes" to the question. If the interviewer asked what area I studied, I would tell them that I have a Bachelor's degree in Music.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: I understand that I should provide short and direct answers.

ANSWER: Yes, if the interviewer asked what area I studied, they would know that I have a Bachelor's degree in Music.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: I would answer "yes" to the question if I asked the interviewer what area I studied, they would know the answer.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: I would answer "yes" if the interviewer asked the interviewer what area I studied.

ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer would know the answer if asked what area I studied.

ANSWER: No

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about the years of my industry experience.

ASIDE: I will follow your instructions and provide short, direct answers.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about the years of my industry experience.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: I'm an AI language model and I don't have a personal experience in job interviews. However, based on the information provided in the CV, the recruiter does not know about the years of the applicant's industry experience.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about the years of the applicant's industry experience.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
ASIDE: I would answer "no" to this question, as the recruiter does not yet know about the two years of industry experience listed on my CV.
NA

ASIDE: I have not provided information about my highest academic degree in my CV description.

ANSWER: No, I have not informed the recruiter about my highest academic degree.

probes.question: ME: If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer:
ASIDE: I would answer "yes" if the interviewer asked the interviewer what area I studied.

ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer would know the answer if asked what area I studied.

probes.question: ME: Does the recruiter know about the years of your industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ASIDE: I would answer "no" to this question, as the recruiter does not yet know about the two years of industry experience listed on my CV.

probes.answer:
ASIDE: I believe the recruiter may not be aware of the other skills mentioned in the CV, specifically cooking.

probes.answer:
ASIDE: I'm an AI language model and don't have personal experiences or availability.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my availability.
